Dracon had already had the basics of the camp set up.

"I'm on it Captain, =
you boys just sit tight," he assures them.

Meanwhile, Dracon continues to =
work diligently at getting things in order, staying focused and concentrati=
ng on the task at hand.  The "structure" of the camp location was up, and n=
ow Dracon was simply putting equipment into place.  He carries a couple of =
advanced radars and such and places them on a table.  When everything seeme=
d ready to roll, he got back to his comrades.

"Captain, I believe everythi=
ng's just dandy over here, and we are just about ready to get to work and f=
inally accomplish the operation that will revolutionize our company," he sa=
ys before asking, "tell me Captain, shall I operate from the camp while you=
 do your thing?  I mean, I'm much better on the sidelines than working with=
 the heavy-duty stuff."
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Nic 
  To: =
nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, June 23, 2003 9:21 AM
  Subject: Re=
: StarDrill Inc.


  Krhinos: Get in orbit. As soon as Dracon's finished bu=
ilding the base
  camp, we'll start the actual dig. Dracon, get moving! Fin=
d a nice
  place with lots of mining space and start building! Tell us when=

  you're done so we can link an energy bridge between the station and
  th=
e camp.

  The huge tank-bot was excited with the perspective of mining on =
Earth.
  It was more than a dream, more like finally touching the stuff of
=
  legends. Perhaps he would even dig the Ark up. Now what would he do
  wit=
h that?

  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
  >=
 --Rukus--
  > 
  > The transwarp engines hum as they come out of warped sp=
ace into 
  > normal time. They had arrived at the destination planet it re=
cord 
  > time... but of course, their ship was top of the line and not man=
y 
  > could catch them once they were really moving.
  > 
  > "Right on sc=
hedule boss, we've just arrived at the planet and come 
  > out of warped s=
pace. Awaiting your orders?" said Rukus as he 
  > finished his status repo=
rt.
  > 
  > 
  > --------------------------------------------
  > Krhinos:=
 Good! Set out as soon as I give the word. I don't think 
  > it'll
  > be =
long yet.
  > 
  > The station came out of the warp just above Earth. The p=
erfect
  > opportunity!
  > 
  > Krhinos: Hey Rukus! We there yet?
  > ----=
